title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 74.3 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 74.3 - General provisions

State Regulations

The provisions of the Environmental Conservation Law and of
regulations fixed by order in relation to open seasons, hunting hours, manner
of taking, use of firearms and other activities shall apply to hunting in the
area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
74.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
